title: Apigee - Get started with API hub
abstract:
# Apigee - Get started with API hub
**    Preview    — Apigee API hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
This document describes how to get started with installing API hub.
Ensure that you have met the [ API hub prerequisites](/apigee/docs/api-hub/prerequisites) , and then choose one of the following methods to provision API hub:
| Method     | Description                 | Next step    |
|:--------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------|
| Wizard     | Recommended Easiest Less prone to error          | Provision using the UI |
| Command line instructions | High level of control No hidden tasks -- you do them all      | Provision using the CLI |
| Script     | One step: define the values; the script does the rest Does not support Windows | Provision using a script |
After API hub is provisioned (it takes about 30 minutes), see [  Next steps](/apigee/docs/api-hub/next-steps) for some tips on how to get started using API hub
